known_issues: Admin login/dashboard issue on live site: 'Reset Admin Credentials' fails (error/no response/wrong redirect) but works in local development.

existing_features.title: Make the “Reset Admin Credentials” flow work reliably on the deployed (live) site by ensuring the frontend can always create a working backend actor on the target network and does not fail due to missing/invalid admin token initialization.
Require an authenticated Internet Identity session before attempting to reset the admin password, and guide the user through authentication if they try to reset while unauthenticated.

Improve error handling for the reset password call so that live-site failures (traps, unauthorized, timeouts, unreachable backend) are correctly categorized and displayed, avoiding “no response” and “wrong redirect” outcomes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix 'Reset Admin Credentials' not working on live admin login/dashboard (errors/no response/wrong redirect; works locally)

Harden the backend resetAdminPassword endpoint to prevent insecure or inconsistent behavior across environments by explicitly rejecting anonymous callers and returning consistent errors for invalid input.
Add a focused regression check for the deployed scenario: verify that Admin Login, Reset Admin Credentials, and subsequent admin verification behave the same on local and deployed networks.

projectName: Fix Reset Admin Credentials failure on live admin login/dashboard
